levelDetail._levelSizeComment: The first level has 400 height and 700 width
levelDetail._slimePosComment: It determine each slime strating position
levelDetail._levelfloorheightcomment: it determine how height of the floor
levelDetail._stickmanSizeComment: Your main character can be normal or large. What pixel dimensions these match can be up to you.
levelDetail._stickmanPosComment: Stickman start at the x position indicated, with their y position being on your 'floor'. This must be a positive double.
levelDetail._cloudVelocityComment: Clouds should move the given number of pixels per second. This must be a positive double. This is not a required feature in assignment 2 but we leave it here as a sample only for students who are interested in this feature.
